document_data.name: Lo Blank
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lo Blank''' was a smuggler and an [[archer]] who worked with the infamous [[The Guild|Guild]] in the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{Quote|''Nice to meet a Guildy—put in a good word for me, yeah?''|Lo Blank}}
document_data.Description: Lo had a light olive skin and chestnut hair. She wore a light ruffled tunic and was armed with a simple [[bow]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Lo Blank worked for a gruff [[hin]] smuggler named [[Big Huido]], transporting [[weapon]]s, [[drug]]s, and [[firewine]] into Baldur's Gate. The shipments were well defended by Lo and the rest of the crew and all were released into the hands of the members of the Guild only. One such shipment during the [[Absolute crisis]] was a chest containing [[essence of ether]], [[dream mist]], [[silkroot]], and [[terazul]]—all illegal substances in the city.
